text: بل يريد كل امرئ منهم ان يؤتى صحفا منشرة

translations.translation: In fact each one of them wants to be given an unfurled scroll.
In fact every one of them wants to be given open books (like the prophets).
No indeed; each one of them desires that open letters be sent to each of them.
Is it that everyone of them wants to receive a heavenly book addressed to him personally?
Rather each one of them desires that he should be given open Books.
Nay, everyone of them desires that he should be given pages spread out.
Nay; every one of them desires that he may be given pages spread out;
Nay, every man of them desires to be -- given -- scrolls unrolled.
Nay, but everyone of them desireth that he should be given open pages (from Allah).
Indeed, everyone of them desires to have sheets of revelations unfolded before them --
Aye! every one of them desireth that: he should be vouchsafed scrolls expanded.
But everyone of them desires to be given unrolled scriptures [from Allah]!
Forsooth, each one of them wants to be given scrolls (of revelation) spread out!

Nay, everyone of them desires that he should be given pages spread out (coming from Allah with a writing that Islam is the right religion, and Muhammad SAW has come with the truth from Allah the Lord of the heavens and earth, etc.).
Indeed, each one of them desires to be given unrolled scrolls.
Yet every one of them desires to be given scrolls unrolled.
Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

[74:52] Nay, but everyone of them desires to be given unrolled scrolls, from God, exalted be He, [enjoining them] to follow the Prophet (s), as they said [before], ‘And [even then] we will not believe your ascension until you bring down for us a book that we may read’ [Q. 17:93].

(Nay, but everyone of them desireth that he should be given open pages (from Allah)) a book wherein is written his crimes and repentance, for they said: "bring us a book in which is written our crimes and repentance and we will believe in you".

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِىءٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفاً مُّنَشَّرَةً } قال الإِمام زيد بن علي عليهما السلامُ: معناه أنَّ الكُفارَ قالوا: إن كانَ محمدٌ صادقاً، فليَصبح تَحتَ كُلِّ واحدٍ صَحيفةٌ أنَّ لَهُ الجَنةَ وأَنهُ آمنٌ مِنَ النَّارِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِىءٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ } له من قِبَل الحق { صُحُفاً } قراطيس مدونة { مُّنَشَّرَةً } [المدثر: 52] تنشر وقت القراءة، ثمَّ تُطوى، كالصكوك والسجلات؛ لذلك قالوا للنبي صلى الله عليه وسلم: لن نتبعك حتى تأتي كلاًّ منَّا بكتاب من السماء مكتوب فيها: من الله إلى فلان، اتَّبع محمداً، فإنه نبي صادق
